verbs.description: A couple weeks ago , communications between Donald Trump and his longtime attorney Michael Cohen [V: were] seized in an FBI raid of Cohen 's home and office . And ever

[ARGM-TMP: A couple weeks ago] , [ARG1: communications between Donald Trump and his longtime attorney Michael Cohen] were [V: seized] [ARGM-LOC: in an FBI raid of Cohen 's home and office] . And [ARGM-TMP: ever]
